alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued March 29 at 4:13AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST HEALTH ALERT IN EFFECT FOR THE POWDER RIVER BASIN OF NORTHEASTERN WYOMING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... The following message is transmitted in collaboration with the Wyoming Department of Environmental Quality, Air Quality Division. * WHAT...North-northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to around 50 mph. * WHERE...Powder River Basin of northeastern Wyoming. * WHEN...11 AM to 6 PM Today. * IMPACTS...The strong winds will create blowing dust. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... The Wyoming Air Quality Division recommends the elderly, young children, and individuals with respiratory problems avoid excessive physical exertion and minimize outdoor activities during this time. Although these people are most susceptible to health impacts, the air quality division also advises that everyone should avoid prolonged exposure to the poor air quality conditions.
